meaningMnemonic: Take a <radical>measurement</radical> of the <radical>road</radical>. Hmm. It seems a bit too long. As you measure it, you continue down this road, wondering where it will <kanji>lead</kanji> you.
readingMnemonic: Where does the road that you're measuring <kanji>lead</kanji> you? An awesome <reading>dou</reading>ghnut (どう) shop!
